My research interest is broadly in Computer Vision. Specifically, I am interested generative models and their application in various discriminative tasks.
I am currently working as an AI Engineer at Qualcomm. Previously, I worked as a Research Assistant at the Vision and AI Lab (VAL), at the Indian Institute of Science (IISc) under Prof.Â Venkatesh Babu.
